attributes.action: stop deleting comments left on this website or have an area on the petition to state opinions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have noticed that opinions and comments are now being deleted from petitions. These can be helpful in getting a better understanding of the subject being petitioned about, even correcting inaccuracies (plus many are quite amusing).

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
